title: Ep 10: Famous In Love Book Club & Where Are All The Good Female YA Protagonists?
itunes:title: Ep 10: Famous In Love Book Club & Where Are All The Good Female YA Protagonists?
description:
This Ep, we're talking about Famous In Love by Rebecca Serle. The book centers around a 17-year old Hollywood newcomer who is cast as the lead in a blockbuster trilogy based off a hit book series. There's drama galore! But we're also talking about our 90's Clinique faves, Becca's upcoming work hiatus, our favorite book fandoms, and what makes a good YA protagonist.

Join us in 2 weeks for our next book club around To All The Boys I've Loved Before by Jenny Han.

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
